headline.main: Scalia Family Donates Justice's Papers to Harvard Law School
headline.print_headline: Scalia Family Donates Justice's Papers to Harvard Law School

lead_paragraph: Harvard Law School says the family of the late Justice Antonin Scalia will donate his papers to the school's library.
snippet: Harvard Law School says the family of the late Justice Antonin Scalia will donate his papers to the school's library....
